name: PHP South Africa
description: This meetup is for any PHP developers interested in discussing the latest trends in PHP development, popular PHP frameworks and their own work.

name: Cape Town AWS Meetup
description: Community driven monthly meetup to discuss various aspects & services of Amazon Web Services. If you are curious about what AWS is, or want to start using it, or a seasoned veteran, join us for the monthly discussion around all things AWS.

name: Cape Town Python Users' Group (CTPUG)
description: We hold regular meetings to discuss various aspects of python - interesting modules and projects, recent developments and so forth.

name: DevConf
description: DevConf is a community-driven, professional software developer focused, one-day conference hosted annually.

name: UX SA
description: UX South Africa is an annual conference that explores relevant topics impacting the industry.
